title: [Large-Scale] Balanced Constructivist-Direct Instruction Design Workshop for Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational online learning experience and elementary education fieldwork
context.additional_context: Conducted in a constrained technological environment using smartphones, applying project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can design a one-week language learning module on MOOCs platforms that integrates constructivist (collaborative activities) and instructivist (structured content) approaches.
Learners can develop a blended learning design plan incorporating a feedback system optimized for smartphone environments.
Learners can propose three or more differentiated activity design strategies reflecting learner profiles (gender, sociocultural background) and learning objectives.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
